alert.note: Alert for Coastal Pender; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 7:33PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT EASTERN PENDER COUNTY THROUGH 815 PM EST... At 732 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers 11 miles southeast of Johnny Mercer Pier, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Surf City, Hampstead, Topsail, Woodside, Edgecomb, and Scotts Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina.
